projects.title: Beeswax
projects.description: Skill-sharing app created mainly for Hive Helsinki students - to facilitate networking within the school in a fun and natural way. The service utilizes the 42 API for authentification.

projects.title: sannasilander
projects.description: Personal portfolio for stylist Sanna Silander. The client wanted a simplistic website with a clear focus on the work.

projects.title: islajournal
projects.description: Second issue of Fashion Zine ISLA Journal. The client provided the designs, so the emphasis during the work was to realize the artists' vision to the t and bring it to life on a computer screen and on mobile.
